description: After a full day and night of travelling, Dalton Riley and Will Braun are pretty bummed to find out the hotel messed up their reservation and stuck them with a single queen bed. Both exhausted, they try to make the best of it, and when Dalton's sleepy boner rubs up against Will's ass, it turns out to be a blessing in disguise, as these two platonic buddies suddenly find out they've both been hiding secret feelings for each other. Luckily, there's a queen bed right there for them to finally express themselves. And oh, the things they have to express to each other. One thing is for sure: after today these two buddies will never look at a single bed the same way again...Enjoy!
title: Bed Buddies
